title: Tools to be Successful
description: To be successful in your open source journey, it's essential to familiarize yourself with the tools and platforms commonly used by the community. These tools will help you collaborate effectively, manage your projects, and contribute to open source projects. In this chapter, we'll discuss the following essential tools for open source collaboration:

frontMatter.title: Tools to be Successful
keywords: tools to contribute to open source projects
Getting Started with Git and GitHub
contributing to open source with VS Code
Discord benefits when contributing to open source projects
